amnesiacWinCondition: Remember a role and satisfy its win condition.
executionerWinCondition: Eliminate your target at all costs.
jesterWinCondition: Get eliminated by all means necessary.
nkWinCondition: Kill everyone who would oppose you.
mafiaWinCondition: Kill all townies and competing evil factions.
survivorWinCondition: Live to see the end of the game.
witchWinCondition: Survive to see the Town lose the game.
